definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Complex fractures, though—those that involve bones shattered into fragments—are more challenging.
sentences.chinese: 可使若骨折的骨片错综复杂则很难矫正。

sentences.english: Napier's bones, a series of rods that made it very easy to multiply large numbers.
sentences.chinese: 发明的骨片算尺，使得较大数字的乘法变得十分简单。

sentences.english: The archeologists found fragments of bone in the burial chamber.
sentences.chinese: 考古学家在墓穴中发现了碎骨片。

sentences.english: Its flexible jaws and scales makes it possible to eat the animal whole.
sentences.chinese: 它的有柔性口和鳞骨片使吃动物全部是可能的。

sentences.english: The initial posterior bone work is done using rongeur to remove the process spinous and any accessible bone fragments.
sentences.chinese: 手术开始阶段使用咬骨钳咬出棘突和够得着的骨片。
